roleset.name: get rid of in a hurry

role.descr: agent, entity getting rid of something

example.name: transitive
example.text: And while Polly Peck isn't jettisoning the existent top-management structure of Sansui, it is bringing in a former Toshiba Corp. executive as executive vice president and chief operating officer.
example.arg: the existent top-management structure of Sansui

roleset.note: Based on sentences in the financial subcorpus. No corresponding VN or FN classes. updated 12/10 by Katie.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'jettison' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry.
